alert.note: Alert for Bell; Harlan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 8:11PM EDT until June 11 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Harlan County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Bell County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 811 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cubage, or 11 miles southeast of Pineville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pathfork around 820 PM EDT. Hensley Store around 825 PM EDT. Peepace Store around 830 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Martins Fork Lake, Crummies and Cranks. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
